title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.6 - Moving parts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.6 - Moving parts

State Regulations

Moving parts which can be demonstrated to be capable of
causing injury if touched while in motion incidental to normal operation shall
be so located or enclosed that they cannot be touched while their motion is
sufficient to cause injury. Protecting enclosures shall be of substantial
construction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
